import React, {useState} from 'react' import home_bg from './home_bg2.jpg' function Home() { return (

College Connect

A platform made by college students for college students

As a student, you know how expensive it is to be enrolled in college. On top of tuition fees, dorm costs, a meal plan, you’re also expected to pay for ‘required’ books worth hundreds of dollars for the class. The books you pay for should be worth the money you spend, and more importantly, be something you actually use. Is that an unreasonable demand? We at CollegeConnect don’t think so. CollegeConnect makes sure you never spend more than you should, to get the academic success you deserve in all your courses. We connect you to students who have taken the courses you plan to take and know first-hand just how useful their books were to create your successful academic experience.

Get started!

) } export default Home;
